Information

Topic 1

TOPICS TO COVER

SEPTEMBER school photos, extended care news/updates, parking reminders (limited parking Wednesday evenings), getting connected (church info about groups, service times, etc.), fall mission project

NOVEMBER reminder of how we communicate (school closures etc.), calling ext. 187 after 5, winter clothes, fall mission follow-up, Christmas Eve service times, reminder to be mindful of kids in parking lot during drop-off & pick-up, reminder of office closures over Thanksgiving & Christmas break, mission projects, other relevant family church info

JANUARY registration dates & direction to watch email for more info as registration gets closer, graduation & class photos (just list days, not specific times), other relevant church info

MARCH spring mission project info, health reminder (please inform us of illnesses & sick policy), Easter services, other relevant church info

MAY spring mission project follow-up, parent survey coming soon, VBS, important end of year info etc. 

**We're hiring blurb stays at the bottom, if we're pushing for new staff bump it up. 

Topic 2

Anytime you reference another campus or web page, add a link. Highlight the text you want to link, click on the icon with a world & link above, insert the web page in the url box, 

Topic 3

Update the calendar to the right with upcoming Academy closures or events for the next 2-3 months.

We're Hiring

If you or someone you know has a heart for working with children, check out our web page! We're accepting applications for substitutes, hours range from 7:15 a.m. - 5:45 p.m. and days vary.
